Rasuah and songlap are just lazy criticism. Actually I'm thinking that most people are critical of him simply because he's in an Islamist party and yet using his wealth (whether it is legitimate or not) frivolously. People who don't know him might be thinking, 'how many orphanages have you built?', 'how many charities are you supporting?', 'what have you done for your constituents?' and so on.After all, there is a perception that religious people should live moderately. This is especially when the person concerned is in a political party that shouts all day and all night about religious matters.

SInce he is elected rep, he is answerable.Give you example of how NON muslim, NON Islamic party answer :A couple of years ago,Tian Chua was questioned on how come he could buy a Merz S class, where he got the money from. Accusation by MCA or Gerakan, forgot who. Tian Chua produced documents on the cost of the car, the loan he took to show he could afford to buy it on his MP salary(loan of RM1,000+ per month). It was a 2nd hand E class car.He further told the MCA/Gerakan guy to cease talking about that subject or he will sue for defamation.http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/176257Kan dah jelas macam tu, ini pulak jawab "kalau aku nak beli lori, kapal terbang itu hak aku" Rakyat bayar gaji dia sekarang/
